location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Collin Mactavish, Assistant Surgeon, in charge at Bushire to Captain Robert Taylor, Resident at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication from the Resident at Bussora [Basra], dated 28 September 1823, which conveyed the Resident's approval over Mactavish remaining at Bushire for the time being. It notes that the Resident at Bussora will be kept informed of all matters of importance occurring at Bushire.
